name: Run & Avoid the Sun
description:
Survive as long as you can against knights who want your blood, and the sun. Sun exposure will set you on fire. Seek shade during the day.

WASD - Move

ESC - Restart

Assets Used:

Jungle Tileset by finalbossblues (itch.io)
